publications.name: (Accepted) Analysis of Spatial Characteristics and Driving Factors of Urban Public Transportation Travel Based on Point of Interest Data
publications.summary: Urban public transportation is an important travel mode for alleviating traffic congestion and reducing environmental pollution. Exploring the interactive relationship between built environment and the distribution of public transport ridership is crucial for guiding the healthy development of public transportation system...

publications.name: Impact of Spatio-Temporal evolution of freeway networks on Socio-Economic Dynamics: A case study from Fujian, China
publications.publisher: Transportation Research Part A: Policy and Practice
publications.summary: Freeway infrastructures play a pivotal role in driving socio-economic development. However, without a comprehensive understanding of the relationship between freeway network evolution and socio-economic dynamics, it would be difficult to further shape the economic landscape through adjustments in the freeway network layout...

projects.name: Curbside parking management
projects.summary: Explore the bidirectional interplay between the distribution of on-street parking space and the equilibrium of traffic flow in an urban road network.
highlights: Designed a Bi-level optimization model to address the interaction between on-street parking space disytibution and traffic flow equilibrium
Single-level reduction was applied to simplify the Bi-level structure, evolutionary Heuristics was employed to solve the reformulated single-level problem.

projects.name: Advanced planning and scheduling for Vitasoy
projects.summary: Design the beverage production schedule for Vitasoy, ensure production satisfy customer demand meanwhile maintaining inventory at optimal level, minimizing production line changeover costs, accommodate manufacturing with varing raw-material blend formulations, etc.
highlights: Penalty method were introduced to handle soft constraints such as inventory level and material production ratio
Lexicographic method were introduced to solve the multi-objective problem

projects.name: Impact of Spatio-Temporal evolution of freeway networks on Socio-Economic Dynamics: A case study from Fujian, China
projects.summary: Explore the relationship between freeway network evolution and socio-economic dynamics
highlights: Multiscale geographically and temporally weighted regression (MGTWR) is employed to quantify the economic stimulatory effects of freeway network evolution
